narrative.title: Folgore Division - 1942Q4
narrative.situation: Italian Parachute Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q4.
narrative.objectives: Elite parachute division employed as ordinary infantry in defensive operations at El Alamein
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

supply.notes: Critical supply situation during El Alamein battle. Division isolated and encircled.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Airborne qualified (not employed in airborne role in North Africa)
Light infantry with emphasis on anti-tank defense

supply_states.notes: Critical supply situation during El Alamein battle. Division isolated and encircled.
